div.p: Greetings. Yesterday I sent to you the acts of the Diet of Augsburg, now I send to you the laws of the Geneva academy and what has been written from Lyon. On the 17th, the king was anointed. Philip is now in Spain.
The Duke of Savoy is still with the King of France. I hope to see you soon.
To Mr. Heinrich Bullinger, most vigilant pastor of the Church of ZÃ¼rich, his friend.
